name: Breaking Bad
description: Set and filmed in Albuquerque, New Mexico, the series tells the story of Walter White, a struggling and depressed high school chemistry teacher who is diagnosed with lung cancer

name: Orange Is the New Black
description: The series begins revolving around Piper Chapman, a woman in her thirties living in New York City who is sentenced to 15 months in Litchfield Penitentiary

name: The Big Bang Theory
description: Leonard and Sheldon are brilliant physicists but socially challenged. They interact with Penny and friends, while juggling careers, relationships, and family life.

name: Sherlock
description: Sherlock depicts consulting detective Sherlock Holmes solving various mysteries in modern-day London. Assisted by his flatmate Dr. John Watson.

name: A Very English Scandal
description: A fact-based British television comedy-drama miniseries based on John Preston's book of the same name.
